alert.note: Alert for Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 11:56AM CST until January 23 at 2:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Wet Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Stephenson County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate to heavy snow will come to an end from south to north through 2 PM. Snowfall rates close to one inch an hour are possible before the snow ends. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&
